item.description: Content file Content Format Content Source and Rendering Slides delimiters Speaker Notes Content file A content file is composed by 2 main components: Front matter using YAML format delimited by ---. item.title: Markdown
item.description: Introduction Element Attributes Slide Attributes Tips & Tricks Introduction Slides as Code is a Hugo theme that uses Markdown and Shortcodes to implement slides content. Slides as Code doesn’t use Hugo’s Markdown renderer, but Reveal.js Markdown renderer called marked. Thereby, Slides As Code is supporting GitHub Flavored Markdown, see Guide and Reference for further information. On top of marked, Reveal.
